features: BEST VALUE SSD – Compact and reliable SSD to meet your on-the-go demand. Compatible with PS4/PS5, Macs, and PCs. Save space and loading time on your console by storing your game data on Buffalo SSDs.

IDEAL ON-THE-GO ACCESSORY - Quickly copy your large data. If you are a professional in need of fast and secure storage, the Buffalo SSD is ready for on-the-go backup for photos, videos, docs, and more.
FAST SPEEDS AND MULTI-TASKING - Faster speed than HDD enables you to connect the device to PC and do large intensive tasks simultaneously.

COMPACT, DURABLE, & RELIABLE – Shock-resistant, rugged design provides drop protection. Compact form factor to carry your data in your pocket. No matter if it’s for work or fun, you can easily use your Buffalo SSD on-the-go.

USB 3.2 CONNECTIVITY & 3-YEAR WARRANTY – Supports USB-C / USB-A. Easily connect the Buffalo SSD to your PC and other mobile devices. THREE-YEAR WARRANTY for registered devices (two years if unregistered).
body.description: The Buffalo SSD-PG is an award-winning external SSD drive (Solid State Drive) that gives you fast, secure file storage that you can fit into your pocket. With its durability, compact form factor, and lightning fast SSD speeds, you can always have your data with you. The portable and powerful SSD allows you to easily back up all your data without needing to upload them the cloud. Even if you are in a remote location with no Internet, you will still have a backup of all your files. The best budget SSD at 500GB & 1TB capacities.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Best value SSD for storage and gaming, Fast speeds and multitasking, compact, durable, reliable

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The SSD-PG lets you carry your important data in a compact and portable package, just a little bigger than a credit card. By moving PS5 or PS4 games to this SSD, you can free up space on your PS5 or PS4 console for more games and other content. You can also enjoy faster loading times on games stored on the SSD. This SSD is equipped with a USB 3.2 Type-A connector and also includes a USB Type-C connector. After formating the drive in exFAT mode, you can use the SSD with both Windows and Mac.

The SSD-PG is designed with the USB connector is indented inside the body. This mitigates the stress given to the connection area and reduces the risk of connection troubles. This SSD product passed U.S. MIL-STD 810G 516.6 procedure IV test, allowing it to withstand drops from 4 feet high. This durable SSD is encased in a rugged design that provides increased shock resistance and overall drop protection. With no moving parts inside, your data is safely stored and protected even after an accidental drop.
Buffalo has won the best-selling SSD spot from several Japanese major awards. We continue to offer high quality products to serve our customers throughout the world.

Buffalo SSD-PG External SSD Drive Buffalo SSD-PUT External SSD Drive Special Features Value SSD for storage & gaming, Shock resistance Compact SSD for storage & gaming, Shock resistance Drive Type SSD SSD Capacity Range 500 GB - 1TB 500 GB - 1TB Shock/Water/Dust Resistance Military Spec Shock Military Spec Shock Connection Type USB 3.2, Type A &C USB 3.2, Type A &C Dimensions (WxHxD) 4.6 x 3.0 x 0.5 in 2.7 x 0.9 x 0.4 in Transfer Speed Up to 340MB/s Up to 600MB/s Weight 5.9 ounces 0.6 ounces Wy Period 3 years with registration 3 years with registration

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice drive for the price
reviews.reviewText: Good little drive. Performs as advertised (using the correct USB port version or faster). Runs warm, though that was after a stress so no real concerns. The enclosure is very cheap feeling, though I can get past that and may actually help with heat.It did have an autorun BAT file and an icon file. I'm assuming the BAT file was to tell your system to pull the icon, though I have that stuff disabled and didn't care to check before doing a full initial wipe.Posting with a picture of CrystalDiskMark with the same settings as some others. I had it plugged into a USB 3.2 (Gen2) port. I noticed those that ran slower were on pots (like 3.0) that realistically are much slower than the advertised theoretical speeds for the standard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buffalotech Rocks with this one
reviews.reviewText: Huge capacity 1TB. The drive is a bit wide, but it ls light and easy to use, with retractable connector. It slows a bit, when NOT connected to a USB 3.2 hub, but when it is, it is super fast. Says up to 600 mb/s and it is right there! As fast as any SATA III SSD. Even after heavy writing, it stays cool to the touch. Excellent drive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: This replaced an old USB 2Tb portable drive. The SSD is much faster and smaller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Product EXCEPT for Slow LARGE Writes
reviews.reviewText: Once I FINISHED getting my 800gb of crucial files (from two PCs) onto this ingenious device, this Buffalo SSD (an SSD hiding in a USB stick format) will BE TERRIFIC: IT reads and sends files BACK to any PC very fast. However, I had to backup manually, chunks at a time, because this drive has ZERO head dissipation ability. I.e., after just a few multi-gigabyte multi-file backups TO it, its speed (on my modern PC0 kept thottling back from 400-450 mbps, down to the 20s (!!!). The good news? This gadget DOES protect itself from burning up BY so drastically throttling back. The bad news? Whenever this "throttling" does happen, the drive's measured temperature has quickly soared from 30 degrees C to over 65. Weirdly, the case gets barely warm, which tells me all that heat just SITS INSIDE, until it is removed and allowed to cool for an hour. HOWEVER, after one finally GETS such big chunks of files ON this drive, it will be GREAT for portability, fast RETRIEVAL of files and reliability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is awesome
reviews.reviewText: I have MacBook Air M2 connected to a caldigit thunderbolt dock. I tried connecting many hard drives but they disconnect all the time. Really good hard drives too that don't give me issues anywhere else. I bought this because it looked really cool. This hard drive never disconnects. Speeds are nowhere as fast as advertised, could be many factors in play but a lot faster than spinning hard drives. I don't have large files or transfer much. This thing is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Faster than I thought. Easy to use and works great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great capacity and fast
reviews.reviewText: This flash drive has great capacity and is lightning fast. My only complaint is that it is not as sturdy as I would like. I just drop it in a used medicine bottle for protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good, Misleading Speed
reviews.reviewText: Good, convenient drive. The listing says it reaches 600MB/s. CrystalDiskMark says otherwise. This drive gets to 460MB/s, and I've already made sure the firmware was up-to-date. I'm also using USB 3.0, obviously given that USB 2.0 is 480mbps, or 60MB/s and I'm getting ~3.7gbps, or 460MB/s. The drive feels cheaply built, but it seems like it'd last a long time if taken care of. I'm kind of concerned the performance won't last long. Considering its price and size, it's probably a really good USB drive for someone who needs 2TB for whatever reason.
Does NOT WORK for Sony Playstation 5 disc edition. Says not compatible. I'm sure my son will find another use for it so my $200 doesn't go to waste.

reviews.reviewTitle: The quality of the usb is quite low
reviews.reviewText: The usb is basically fully plastic, that being it bends quite easily without pressing too hard. The rest works fine.
un disco esterno veramente utile, e poi piccolo e veloce come disco esterno

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: ITS A Great product i use it for more memory for the PS5
